title: inbamenbadu
sahitya:
inbamenbadilaiyE ulaginil inbamenbadilaiyE ulaginil


anupallavi

  inbaminbam ena ninaindu pin varu tunbam irumaDangu aDaindiduvadalad-


caraNam 1    vAkku manam kAyamenum mUnrilum jAkkira svapna suSubdhiyilum
sUkSma kAraNa tUlamUnrirkkum nIkkamara unadu anbilAmaiyAl
  caraNam 2    Akkai eduttadu mudal unadanbar shErkkai shiridum ilaiyE
kAkkai virumbum vEmbE ena en nAkku virumbum punmozhi yaadhalin-
  caraNam 3    Ikkum oru shirihum igilEnarivinAikkum kaDaiyAnEn
vAkinil inbamilai manadil anbumilai pEikkurangu pOl uzhalum enaduLatt-
  caraNam 4    vidduvAn parama bhattan ena metta vEDamiTTadanri cittam urugi viSayattai veruttunaic-cintaiyil kaNamum cintiyAmaiyA
  caraNam 5    poruLilArkku ivvulagam illai unadaruLilArkku angilai iruLaDainda nenjan- ERkayya ivviru vaghaiyum ilAmaiyAl irumaiyilum
  caraNam 6    vASavanO madanOvena eNNi manattirumAppuruvEn dAsar inaththil shErttaruLvAi rAmadAsan thozhum kailASa vAsanE
